jobs.title: SEO Content Marketer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About ElevenLabs

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

We launched in January 2023 with the first AI model to cross the threshold of human-like speech. In January 2025, we raised a $180 million Series C round, valuing the company at $3.3 billion. By September 2025, that valuation doubled to $6.6 billion as we surpassed $200 million ARR in under three years.

Our mission is to build the most important audio AI platform in the world, solve AI audio intelligence, and make information accessible in any voice, language, or sound.

Our core offerings are our Creative Platform and the Agents Platform, powered by proprietary Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and conversational AI models.

We are just getting started. If you want to work hard and create lasting impact, we would like to hear from you.

How we work

  • High-velocity: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the role

We care deeply about SEO. It drives 1+ million users per month to our site, millions of dollars in revenue, and we have an authority score of 69 on SEMRush. However, we're in a huge market that's expanding rapidly, and we've only scratched the surface of what's possible. Now is a critical time for us to scale our content creation efforts to capture more of this opportunity.

We're hiring a SEO Content Marketer to establish ElevenLabs as the thought leader in AI Audio through strategic, SEO-optimized content creation. You'll create compelling blog posts, use cases, case studies, and landing page copy that not only educates and engages our diverse user base but also drives organic search visibility and traffic growth.

Each new product we launch or foundational model we release unlocks thousands more content opportunities. For example, with our Text to Speech models, we need content covering user journeys, use case deep-dives, and educational blog posts that rank for competitive keywords. Now expand this to Voice Changers, Dubbing, Speech to Text, and many more products on our roadmap.

You'll work closely with our SEO & Growth team to understand keyword opportunities, search intent, and content gaps. This role combines excellent writing skills with SEO strategy to create content that performs both for users and search engines.

Who you are

We're looking for exceptional individuals who combine technical excellence with ethical awareness, who are excited by hard problems and motivated by human impact. You’ll thrive with us if you: 

  • Are passionate about audio AI driven by a desire to make content universally accessible and breaking the frontiers of new tech.  

  • Are a highly motivated and driven individual with a strong work ethic. Our team is aware of this critical moment of audio AI evolution and is committed to going the extra mile to lead. 

  • Are analytical, efficient, and strive on solving complex challenges with a first principles mindset. 

  • Consistently strive for excellence, delivering high-quality work quickly and exceeding expectations.

  • Take initiative and work autonomously from day one, prioritizing learning and contribution while leaving ego aside.

What you bring

Must have:

  • Excellent copywriting skills with a portfolio demonstrating content that has driven measurable SEO results

  • Strong understanding of SEO fundamentals: keyword research, search intent, on-page optimization, and content strategy

  • Experience creating content that ranks for competitive keywords and drives organic traffic growth

  • Proven ability to write for different audiences and content types (blog posts, case studies, landing pages, use cases)

  • Experience using AI tools and LLMs to scale content creation while maintaining quality and brand voice

  • Strong analytics/data sense to track content performance and iterate based on results

  • An interest and understanding of the latest happenings in AI and tech

Nice to have:

  • Experience scaling content creation at a high-growth tech company

  • Familiarity with SEO tools (SEMRush, Ahrefs, etc.) and content management systems

  • Background in B2B SaaS or AI/ML content creation

  • Ability to conduct investigative interviews with team members and customers for case studies and insights

  • Basic understanding of programmatic content and how to work with technical teams

What we offer

  • High-velocity innovation: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

  • A truly global team: Collaboration with teammates across 30+ countries, a global customer footprint and office hubs in New York, London and Warsaw. Annual company offsite for the whole team to get together (the last one in Croatia!) 

  • Remote first: We prioritize your talent, not your location, with structured asynchronous workflows for maximum impact and minimal meetings.

  • Continuous growth: Collaborate with AI leaders, shape your path, and contribute where you excel most.

#LI-Remote

jobs.title: Strategic Partnerships
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About ElevenLabs

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

We launched in January 2023 with the first AI model to cross the threshold of human-like speech. In January 2025, we raised a $180 million Series C round, valuing the company at $3.3 billion. By September 2025, that valuation doubled to $6.6 billion as we surpassed $200 million ARR in under three years.

Our mission is to build the most important audio AI platform in the world, solve AI audio intelligence, and make information accessible in any voice, language, or sound.

Our core offerings are our Creative Platform and the Agents Platform, powered by proprietary Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and conversational AI models.

We are just getting started. If you want to work hard and create lasting impact, we would like to hear from you.

How we work

  • High-velocity: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the role 

This role is remote and can be executed globally. However, to facilitate working with the Partnerships team, we prefer candidates based in the United States.

Join us to build Strategic Partnerships that fuel growth via IP licensing and top-creator collaborations across the creator economy, entertainment and emerging culture. This role blends creator partnership development, marketing, and strategic ecosystem building; forging relationships with rights holders, top creators, platforms, and marketplaces that shape culture. You’ll help elevate ElevenLabs’ voice technology through authentic collaborations, campaigns, and activations that celebrate creativity and expand our reach.

This is not a direct sales role; it’s about creative enablement, strategic alignment, and building trust with the people shaping the future of digital voice.

Responsibilities

  1. Identify, design, and manage collaborations with IP rights holders, top creators, cultural innovators, and industry partners to bring new voice-driven experiences to life. From individual partnerships to large-scale creative campaigns, you’ll help showcase how AI voice can empower expression and storytelling.

  2. Collaborate with product, marketing, and partnerships teams to grow and curate the Iconic Marketplace—onboarding top talent, managing relationships, and ensuring that both established and emerging voices find value and visibility on the platform.

  3. Build and manage relationships with leading creators and influencers across music, film, gaming, and digital media. Design and execute high-impact partnerships that authentically integrate ElevenLabs technology into creator content and social storytelling.

  4. Work closely with marketing and community teams to support activations, product launches, and creative initiatives. Help design co-marketing programs, content partnerships, and events that spotlight innovation using ElevenLabs’ tools.

  5. Collaborate with platforms, creative tool providers, and digital communities to ensure ElevenLabs is embedded where creators make, share, and monetize their work. Support integrations that drive accessibility, discoverability, and creative opportunity.

  6. Help represent ElevenLabs within the creative community. Represent the brand at major creator, tech, and entertainment events—building relationships, shaping industry perception, and promoting thought leadership around AI voice and creative innovation.

What you bring

You’re deeply connected to the world of creators and artists—you understand the pulse of culture and how technology can amplify creativity. You’re curious, proactive, and comfortable at the intersection of innovation, art, and influence.

You bring a creative yet strategic mindset, balancing relationship-building with execution. You know how to communicate with creators and their teams, understand the dynamics of influencer marketing, and can navigate both creative and business conversations with ease.

You thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment, where no two days are the same and where your ability to turn ideas into impactful collaborations sets the tone for success.

  • 6–10+ years’ experience in strategic partnerships, influencer marketing, business development, or creative brand collaborations

  • Experience working in the music and/or entertainment space

  • Deep understanding of the creator economy, influencer landscape, and digital media ecosystems

  • Proven success in negotiating and executing IP partnerships and campaigns that drive cultural and business impact

  • Experience working cross-functionally with marketing, product, and creative teams to deliver high-visibility initiatives

  • Strong communication and relationship-building skills with creators, agencies, and industry partners

  • A passion for empowering creativity and advancing the future of voice and expression

#LI-Remote

 - Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

 - Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

 - Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.


ABOUT THE ROLE 

This role is remote and can be executed globally. However, to facilitate working with the Partnerships team, we prefer candidates based in the United States.

Join us to build Strategic Partnerships that fuel growth via IP licensing and top-creator collaborations across the creator economy, entertainment and emerging culture. This role blends creator partnership development, marketing, and strategic ecosystem building; forging relationships with rights holders, top creators, platforms, and marketplaces that shape culture. You’ll help elevate ElevenLabs’ voice technology through authentic collaborations, campaigns, and activations that celebrate creativity and expand our reach.

This is not a direct sales role; it’s about creative enablement, strategic alignment, and building trust with the people shaping the future of digital voice.



RESPONSIBILITIES

 1. Identify, design, and manage collaborations with IP rights holders, top creators, cultural innovators, and industry partners to bring new voice-driven experiences to life. From individual partnerships to large-scale creative campaigns, you’ll help showcase how AI voice can empower expression and storytelling.

 2. Collaborate with product, marketing, and partnerships teams to grow and curate the Iconic Marketplace—onboarding top talent, managing relationships, and ensuring that both established and emerging voices find value and visibility on the platform.

 3. Build and manage relationships with leading creators and influencers across music, film, gaming, and digital media. Design and execute high-impact partnerships that authentically integrate ElevenLabs technology into creator content and social storytelling.

 4. Work closely with marketing and community teams to support activations, product launches, and creative initiatives. Help design co-marketing programs, content partnerships, and events that spotlight innovation using ElevenLabs’ tools.

 5. Collaborate with platforms, creative tool providers, and digital communities to ensure ElevenLabs is embedded where creators make, share, and monetize their work. Support integrations that drive accessibility, discoverability, and creative opportunity.

 6. Help represent ElevenLabs within the creative community. Represent the brand at major creator, tech, and entertainment events—building relationships, shaping industry perception, and promoting thought leadership around AI voice and creative innovation.


WHAT YOU BRING

You’re deeply connected to the world of creators and artists—you understand the pulse of culture and how technology can amplify creativity. You’re curious, proactive, and comfortable at the intersection of innovation, art, and influence.

You bring a creative yet strategic mindset, balancing relationship-building with execution. You know how to communicate with creators and their teams, understand the dynamics of influencer marketing, and can navigate both creative and business conversations with ease.

You thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment, where no two days are the same and where your ability to turn ideas into impactful collaborations sets the tone for success.

 - 6–10+ years’ experience in strategic partnerships, influencer marketing, business development, or creative brand collaborations

 - Experience working in the music and/or entertainment space

 - Deep understanding of the creator economy, influencer landscape, and digital media ecosystems

 - Proven success in negotiating and executing IP partnerships and campaigns that drive cultural and business impact

 - Experience working cross-functionally with marketing, product, and creative teams to deliver high-visibility initiatives

 - Strong communication and relationship-building skills with creators, agencies, and industry partners

 - A passion for empowering creativity and advancing the future of voice and expression

#LI-Remote

jobs.title: Website Engineering
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About ElevenLabs

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

We launched in January 2023 with the first AI model to cross the threshold of human-like speech. In January 2025, we raised a $180 million Series C round, valuing the company at $3.3 billion. By September 2025, that valuation doubled to $6.6 billion as we surpassed $200 million ARR in under three years.

Our mission is to build the most important audio AI platform in the world, solve AI audio intelligence, and make information accessible in any voice, language, or sound.

Our core offerings are our Creative Platform and the Agents Platform, powered by proprietary Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and conversational AI models.

We are just getting started. If you want to work hard and create lasting impact, we would like to hear from you.

How we work

  • High-velocity: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the role

We're looking for an expert Website / Frontend Engineer to build the best website in the world, the kind that makes your jaw drop.

Your general responsibilities will include:

  • Implement and launch new landing pages that tell the ElevenLabs story and convert visitors into users.

  • Collaborate with designers to translate Figma prototypes into fast, accessible, and delightful experiences.

  • Work on growth engineering projects - run A/B tests, optimize performance, and improve conversion across the funnel.

  • Partner with product teams to create interactive demo experiences that showcase ElevenLabs’ technology.

  • Own the full stack - from building React/Next.js components and APIs to integrating with backend services.

  • Take end-to-end ownership of features: from scoping and implementation to testing, deployment, and monitoring.

Who you are

  • You're a front-end–oriented engineer who loves crafting amazing, high-performance web experiences.

  • You have deep expertise in React and Next.js, and are fluent in TypeScript.

  • You care deeply about UI quality, CSS architecture, motion and microinteractions, and web performance optimization.

  • You’re comfortable diving into backend APIs or integration work when needed, but your true focus is creating exceptional user-facing experiences.

  • You enjoy collaborating closely with designers, growth, and product teams to bring bold ideas to life.

  • You thrive in high-ownership environments where you can move fast and have a tangible impact on product quality and user delight.

Nice to have

  • Experience with A/B testing frameworks, analytics tools, or SEO optimization.

  • Understanding of CRO (conversion rate optimization) best practices.

  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, Vercel, or other modern web deployment setups.

  • Awareness of web security and testing best practices.

jobs.descriptionHtml:

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the role

We’re looking for a highly motivated, self-starter founding Senior Account Executive in ANZ region who is passionate about voice technology and how it is changing businesses. We don’t just sell a product or custom-level solutions; we are partnering with enterprises to help them generate new experiences and monetisation opportunities at scale with our breakthrough voice technology. In this role you will:

  • Build and manage a growing portfolio of new enterprise accounts in the media/publishing or gaming industry to help ElevenLabs meet its revenue goals.

  • Identify new business opportunities in the media/publishing or gaming space that align with ElevenLabs’ product offering and roadmap.

  • Generate leads, negotiate contracts and close sales in collaboration with the Growth team.

  • Develop and maintain a deep understanding of the media/publishing or gaming industry.

  • Be responsible for KPI and sales performance tracking, providing weekly updates to the wider ElevenLabs team.

Requirements

  • Proven track record of meeting & exceeding sales targets in a fast-paced environment.

  • 8-10 years of previous experience in sales in a SaaS organisation.

  • Expertise or willingness to learn everything about conversational AI and how ElevenLabs’ solution can help.

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with stakeholders at all levels of an organization.

  • A hybrid of customer & product-driven mentality that prioritises client satisfaction & scale.

This role is remote and can be executed globally. However, we prefer candidates based in Australia or New Zealand.

#LI-Remote

jobs.title: Landing Page Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About ElevenLabs

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the Role

We’re on the hunt for a Landing Page Designer (Performance Marketing and CRO) to own, build, and optimize our performance marketing landing pages. This is a high-impact, data-driven role where design meets strategy — perfect for someone with strong design and copywriting skills who thrives on creating high-converting pages.

You’ll ideate, create, build, and launch landing page tests from start to finish — then analyze performance data to uncover insights, provide actionable conclusions, and maintain a backlog of optimization ideas. Beyond landing pages, you’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and refine test plans for our main website, driving continuous improvements in user experience and conversion performance.

This role is for someone self-sufficient and experienced — a creative pro who loves to design, write, test, and iterate fast.

Requirements

  • Strong Design + Copy Expertise: Craft visually compelling, on-brand, high-converting pages paired with persuasive, conversion-focused copy.

  • Landing Page Creation: Own the full lifecycle — from brainstorming ideas to designing, developing, and launching performance marketing landing pages. Experience with tools like Framer or Webflow

Bonus:

  • Idea Creator: Ideate a backlog of testing ideas, continuously evolving our landing pages based on performance and user behavior data.

  • Data Analysis: Dive into performance data, uncover insights, and translate results into clear, actionable conclusions.

  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner with marketing, product, and design teams to analyze, strategize, and design impactful test plans for the main site.

  • Performance Optimization: Ensure speed, UX, and CRO best practices are embedded into every landing page build.


Location

This role is remote and can be executed globally. If you prefer, you can work from our offices in Bangalore, Dublin, London, New York, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Warsaw.
#LI-Remote

jobs.title: Growth Engineering - Mobile
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About ElevenLabs

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

We launched in January 2023 with the first AI model to cross the threshold of human-like speech. In January 2025, we raised a $180 million Series C round, valuing the company at $3.3 billion. By September 2025, that valuation doubled to $6.6 billion as we surpassed $200 million ARR in under three years.

Our mission is to build the most important audio AI platform in the world, solve AI audio intelligence, and make information accessible in any voice, language, or sound.

Our core offerings are our Creative Platform and the Agents Platform, powered by proprietary Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and conversational AI models.

We are just getting started. If you want to work hard and create lasting impact, we would like to hear from you.

How we work

  • High-velocity: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

  • Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

  • AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

  • Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

  • Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.

What we offer

  • Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

  • Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

  • Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

  • Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

  • Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

  • Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.

About the role

We’re hiring a Growth Engineer with expertise in full stack web development, growth marketing, SEO and conversion rate optimization (CRO) to help scale our consumer product, ElevenReader.

ElevenReader is redefining the audiobook experience — bringing voice AI to a multibillion-dollar industry with enormous growth potential. Our platform already serves a rapidly expanding global audience of audiobook listeners and features thousands of titles to explore and enjoy through our web app.

We’re doubling down on growth through a combination of SEO, growth marketing, funnel optimization, and performance marketing. We’re looking for someone at the intersection of software engineering and growth — an engineer who’s excited to build, experiment, and measure. You’ll lead hands-on initiatives such as developing programmatic pages for SEO, creating conversion-focused landing pages, and partnering with Growth Marketers to shape and execute our growth campaigns.

Our stack includes Next.js (React, TypeScript) on the frontend and Python (FastAPI) on the backend.

Examples of what you might work on

  • Build programmatic pages for new audiobook listings, collections, and authors — for example, genres like Mystery & Thriller audiobooks.

  • Develop branded web pages for our marketing website major feature launches, such as introducing multi-cast audiobooks.

  • Collaborate with our Growth Marketer to identify and produce SEO-driven content targeting high-priority keywords for written content production.

  • Partner with our performance marketing team to design and implement high-converting landing pages for new paid campaigns.

Requirements

Who you are

We're looking for exceptional individuals who combine technical excellence with ethical awareness, who are excited by hard problems and motivated by human impact. You’ll strive with us if you:

Are passionate about audio AI driven by a desire to make content universally accessible and breaking the frontiers of new tech.

  • Are a highly motivated and driven individual with a strong work ethic. Our team is aware of this critical moment of audio AI evolution and is committed to going the extra mile to lead.

  • Are analytical, efficient, and strive on solving complex challenges with a first principles mindset.

  • Consistently strive for excellence, delivering high-quality work quickly and exceeding expectations.

  • Take initiative and work autonomously from day one, prioritizing learning and contribution while leaving ego aside.

What you bring

We do not require any formal experience, certifications, or degrees. Instead, we are seeking enthusiastic Software Engineers who can showcase solving impressively hard problems with artifacts such as past projects, designs, or GitHub contributions. We do require:

  • Strong frontend engineering skills (React, Typescript) and backend engineering skills (Python ideally but others are fine too)

  • Strong SEO Experience ideating and executing SEO initiatives including programmatic SEO, content marketing, and keyword research

  • Strong Frontend web development and design skills

  • Experience with signup and onboarding conversion rate optimization

  • (Bonus) Experience with performance marketing optimization

Location

This role is remote and can be executed globally. If you prefer, you can work from our offices in Bangalore, Dublin, London, New York, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Warsaw.

#LI-remote

ElevenLabs is a research and product company defining the frontier of audio AI. Millions of people use our technology to read articles, voice over videos, and restore voices lost to disability. Leading developers and enterprises worldwide use ElevenLabs to build intelligent agents for support, sales, and education.

We launched in January 2023 with the first AI model to cross the threshold of human-like speech. In January 2025, we raised a $180 million Series C round, valuing the company at $3.3 billion. By September 2025, that valuation doubled to $6.6 billion as we surpassed $200 million ARR in under three years.

Our mission is to build the most important audio AI platform in the world, solve AI audio intelligence, and make information accessible in any voice, language, or sound.

Our core offerings are our Creative Platform and the Agents Platform, powered by proprietary Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and conversational AI models.

We are just getting started. If you want to work hard and create lasting impact, we would like to hear from you.


HOW WE WORK

 - High-velocity: Rapid experimentation, lean autonomous teams, and minimal bureaucracy.

 - Impact not job titles: We don’t have job titles. Instead, it’s about the impact you have. No task is above or beneath you.

 - AI first: We use AI to move faster with higher-quality results. We do this across the whole company—from engineering to growth to operations.

 - Excellence everywhere: Everything we do should match the quality of our AI models.

 - Global team: We prioritize your talent, not your location.


WHAT WE OFFER

 - Innovative culture: You’ll be part of a generational opportunity to define the trajectory of AI, surrounded by a team pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

 - Growth paths: Joining ElevenLabs means joining a dynamic team with countless opportunities to drive impact - beyond your immediate role and responsibilities.

 - Learning & development: ElevenLabs proactively supports professional development through an annual discretionary stipend.

 - Social travel: We also provide an annual discretionary stipend to meet up with colleagues each year, however you choose.

 - Annual company offsite: Each year, we bring the entire team together in a new location - past offsites have included Croatia and Italy.

 - Co-working: If you’re not located near one of our main hubs, we offer a monthly co-working stipend.


ABOUT THE ROLE

We’re hiring a Growth Engineer with expertise in full stack web development, growth marketing, SEO and conversion rate optimization (CRO) to help scale our consumer product, ElevenReader.

ElevenReader is redefining the audiobook experience — bringing voice AI to a multibillion-dollar industry with enormous growth potential. Our platform already serves a rapidly expanding global audience of audiobook listeners and features thousands of titles to explore and enjoy through our web app.

We’re doubling down on growth through a combination of SEO, growth marketing, funnel optimization, and performance marketing. We’re looking for someone at the intersection of software engineering and growth — an engineer who’s excited to build, experiment, and measure. You’ll lead hands-on initiatives such as developing programmatic pages for SEO, creating conversion-focused landing pages, and partnering with Growth Marketers to shape and execute our growth campaigns.

Our stack includes Next.js (React, TypeScript) on the frontend and Python (FastAPI) on the backend.

Examples of what you might work on

 - Build programmatic pages for new audiobook listings, collections, and authors — for example, genres like Mystery & Thriller audiobooks https://elevenreader.io/genres/mystery_and_thriller.

 - Develop branded web pages for our marketing website https://elevenreader.io/ major feature launches, such as introducing multi-cast audiobooks.

 - Collaborate with our Growth Marketer to identify and produce SEO-driven content targeting high-priority keywords for written content production.

 - Partner with our performance marketing team to design and implement high-converting landing pages for new paid campaigns.


REQUIREMENTS

Who you are

We're looking for exceptional individuals who combine technical excellence with ethical awareness, who are excited by hard problems and motivated by human impact. You’ll strive with us if you:

Are passionate about audio AI driven by a desire to make content universally accessible and breaking the frontiers of new tech.

 - Are a highly motivated and driven individual with a strong work ethic. Our team is aware of this critical moment of audio AI evolution and is committed to going the extra mile to lead.

 - Are analytical, efficient, and strive on solving complex challenges with a first principles mindset.

 - Consistently strive for excellence, delivering high-quality work quickly and exceeding expectations.

 - Take initiative and work autonomously from day one, prioritizing learning and contribution while leaving ego aside.

What you bring

We do not require any formal experience, certifications, or degrees. Instead, we are seeking enthusiastic Software Engineers who can showcase solving impressively hard problems with artifacts such as past projects, designs, or GitHub contributions. We do require:

 - Strong frontend engineering skills (React, Typescript) and backend engineering skills (Python ideally but others are fine too)

 - Strong SEO Experience ideating and executing SEO initiatives including programmatic SEO, content marketing, and keyword research

 - Strong Frontend web development and design skills

 - Experience with signup and onboarding conversion rate optimization

 - (Bonus) Experience with performance marketing optimization


LOCATION

This role is remote and can be executed globally. If you prefer, you can work from our offices in Bangalore, Dublin, London, New York, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Warsaw.
